import.title: Import
import.subtitle: IMPORT
import.description: To import your wallet, enter an address, encrypted key, private key or mnemonic words:
import.inputPlaceholder: Please ender an address or key...
import.importEncryptedDescription: Select the desired blockchain for your new account

addWatch.title: Add a watch account
addWatch.description: Enter the address that you'd like to watch:
addWatch.information: You won't be able to use the assets in this account!

editWallet.title: Edit Wallet
editWallet.nameLengthError: Name must be at least 1 character long

persistAccount.subtitleCreate: Creating an account is easy, just give it a name and select a colour below and you're done!
persistAccount.inputSubtitle: It could be helpful to name your account with a label related to what you want to use the account for (such as ‘Investments’ or ‘Trading’).
persistAccount.selectBlockchainDescription: Please select which chain you would like to use for this account.
persistAccount.deleteAccountSubtext: Deleting an account that contains assets will cause these assets to become inaccessible after deletion!

createWallet.title: Create Wallet
createWallet.heading: Creating your new BIP39 wallet
createWallet.step1Description: This set of secret words make it easy to back up and restore your account. This makes your wallet really secure
createWallet.step2Description: It’s really important you remember your phrase correctly so we will help you with that. If you’re in a rush you can do it another time.
createWallet.step3Header: Give your new wallet a name and passphrase
createWallet.step3Description: Give your wallet a memorable name and passphrase and your ready to go!

step1.title: Generate security phrase
step1.description: Write this phrase down on a piece of paper or record it in a secure digital note. You can also download it below but be sure to keep it safe.
step1.warning: Anyone with this phrase will be able to access your hard-earned assets and you won’t be able to get them back!

step2.title: Confirm security phrase
step2.description: Please select each phrase in the correct order to make sure you’ve got it right:
step2.warning: If you can’t remember your security phrase, don’t worry, you can find it in the ‘Settings’ section of the wallet
step2.tryAgain: Please try again to confirm your back up

step3.title: Give your new wallet a name and passphrase
step3.description: Give your wallet a memorable name, it could be helpful to name it with a label related to what you want to use the wallet for (such as ‘Investments’ or ‘Trading Wallet’).
step3.nameLengthError: Name must be at least 1 character long

step4.title: Congratulations, you’re now the proud owner of a shiny new wallet!
step4.description: Remember to keep your secret phrase safe, having several backups is always a good idea. If you need to find out a wallets secret phrase you can find it in the settings page for that wallet.

successModal.heading: Dapp Request
successModal.subtitle: Transaction successfully sent!
successModal.text: Once your transaction has been confirmed it will appear in your activity feed.

scopes.None: Your signature is only valid for fee payments.
scopes.CalledByEntry: Your signature can only be used by the calling contract and just for this transaction.
scopes.Global: Your signature can be used without restriction with any contract.
scopes.CustomContracts: Your signature can be used by the set of contracts listed above.
scopes.CustomGroups: Your signature can be used by the set of groups listed above.
scopes.WitnessRules: Your signature is only valid for transactions that match the specified rules and conditions, such as the current script hash, group, or calling script hash. This allows for more complex and expressive signature scoping to address edge cases and potential reentrancy attacks.

deleteAccount.title: Edit account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Ensure that you've transferred your assets to a new account before proceeding, so that your assets will be safe
deleteAccount.alert: Deleting an account that contains assets will cause these assets to become inaccessible after deletion!
deleteAccount.warning: Are you sure you want to continue?
